returns.para: This method does not return a value.

summary.para: Adds a profile filter to the specified media stream.

param.name: StreamId
param.para: The ID of the stream to add to.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

param.name: pId
param.para: Pointer to a containing the profile ID.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Determines if a media stream supports the specified media type.

param.name: StreamId
param.para: The ID of the stream to check.

param.name: pMediaType
param.para: Pointer to an describing the media type to check.

param.name: pfSupported
param.para: Returns true if the media type is supported; otherwise, false.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Describes a media foundation sensor profile.
